options.name: Archive
options.description: Archive a channel

options.name: Create
options.description: Initiates a public or private channel-based conversation

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a channel

options.name: Get
options.description: Get information about a channel

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many channels

options.name: Unarchive
options.description: Unarchive a channel

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a channel

properties.name: workspaceId
properties.description: The ID of the workspace. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the channel

options.name: color
options.description: The color of the channel

options.name: description
options.description: The description of the channel

options.name: public
options.description: Whether the channel will be marked as public

options.name: temp_id
options.description: The temporary ID of the channel. It needs to be a negative number.

options.name: user_ids
options.description: The users that will participate in the channel. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: channelId
properties.description: The ID of the channel

properties.name: workspaceId
properties.description: The ID of the workspace. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: archived
options.description: Whether only archived conversations are returned

values.name: action
values.description: The action of the button

values.name: button_text
values.description: The text for the action button

values.name: message
values.description: The text for the action button

values.name: type
values.description: The type of the button. (Currently only action is available).

values.name: url
values.description: URL to redirect

options.name: binaryProperties
options.description: Name of the property that holds the binary data. Multiple can be defined separated by comma.

options.name: direct_mentions
options.description: The users that are directly mentioned. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: mark_thread_position
options.description: Whether the position of the thread is marked

options.name: recipients
options.description: The users that will attached to the comment. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: temp_id
options.description: The temporary ID of the comment

options.name: send_as_integration
options.description: Whether to display the integration as the comment creator

properties.name: commentId
properties.description: The ID of the comment

properties.name: threadId
properties.description: The ID of the channel

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: as_ids
options.description: Whether only the IDs of the comments are returned

options.name: to_obj_index
options.description: Limit comments ending at the specified object index

options.name: newer_than_ts
options.description: Limits comments to those newer when the specified Unix time

options.name: older_than_ts
options.description: Limits comments to those older than the specified Unix time

options.name: order_by
options.description: The order of the comments returned - one of DESC or ASC

options.name: from_obj_index
options.description: Limit comments starting at the specified object index

properties.name: commentId
properties.description: The ID of the comment

properties.name: workspaceId
properties.description: The ID of the workspace. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: conversationId
properties.description: The ID of the conversation. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: content
properties.description: The content of the new message. Mentions can be used as [Name](twist-mention://user_id) for users or [Group name](twist-group-mention://group_id) for groups.

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Other options to set
